```{r}
eulerIntegrate = function(f, x0, dt, tEnd){
  out = data.frame(
    t = seq(from=0, to=tEnd, by=dt),
    x = x0
  )
  xNow = x0
  for (step in 2:nrow(out)){
    dx = f(xNow) * dt
    xNow = xNow + dx
    out[step, "x"] = xNow
  }
  return(out)
}
```
